channel.title: The Gold List Mailing List
channel.description:
A great weekly email from a very talented guy in Columbus that does marketing & strategy for startups & business. He puts together links to tools & resources every week. We need to get him on this forum
[The Gold List][1]
[His latest email contained 8 tips/techniques of how to crowdsource business ideas from actual problems people would talk about online.][2]
[1]: http://davidjsherry.com/gold-list/ [2]: http://eepurl.com/DnMaL

item.title: The Gold List Mailing List
item.dc:creator: JanLukacs
item.description:
Looks good! Thanks for sharing.
